013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
017
018import java.net.*;
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
025
026/**
027 * TODO
028 */
029@Bean(properties="contentType,style,explode,headers,allowReserved,*")
030@FluentSetters
031public class Response extends OpenApiElement{
032
033   private String description;
034   private Map<String,HeaderInfo> headers;
035   private Map<String,MediaType> content;
036   private Map<String,Link> links;
037
038   /**
039    * Default constructor.
040    */
041   public Response() { }
042
043   /**
044    * Copy constructor.
045    *
046    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
047    */
048   public Response(Response copyFrom) {
049      super(copyFrom);
050
051      this.description = copyFrom.description;
052      this.headers = copyOf(copyFrom.headers, HeaderInfo::copy);
053      this.content = copyOf(copyFrom.content, MediaType::copy);
054      this.links = copyOf(copyFrom.links, Link::copy);
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Make a deep copy of this object.
059    *
060    * @return A deep copy of this object.
061    */
062   public Response copy() {
063      return new Response(this);
064   }
065
066   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
067   protected Response strict() {
068      super.strict();
069      return this;
070   }
071
072   /**
073    * Bean property getter:  <property>Description</property>.
074    *
075    * <p>
076    * The URL pointing to the contact information.
077    *
078    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
079    */
080   public String getDescription() {
081      return description;
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Bean property setter:  <property>Description</property>.
086    *
087    * <p>
088    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
089    * <br>Strings must be valid URIs.
090    *
091    * <p>
092    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
093    *
094    * @param value
095    *    The new value for this property.
096    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
097    * @return This object
098    */
099   public Response setDescription(String value) {
100      description = value;
101      return this;
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Bean property getter:  <property>headers</property>.
106    *
107    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
108    */
109   public Map<String, HeaderInfo> getHeaders() {
110      return headers;
111   }
112
113   /**
114    * Bean property setter:  <property>headers</property>.
115    *
116    * @param value
117    *    The new value for this property.
118    * @return This object
119    */
120   public Response setHeaders(Map<String, HeaderInfo> value) {
121      headers = copyOf(value);
122      return this;
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Adds one or more values to the <property>variables</property> property.
127    *
128    * @param key The mapping key.
129    * @param value
130    *    The values to add to this property.
131    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
132    * @return This object
133    */
134   public Response addHeader(String key, HeaderInfo value) {
135      headers = mapBuilder(headers).sparse().add(key, value).build();
136      return this;
137   }
138
139   /**
140    * Bean property getter:  <property>headers</property>.
141    *
142    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
143    */
144   public Map<String, MediaType> getContent() {
145      return content;
146   }
147
148   /**
149    * Bean property setter:  <property>content</property>.
150    *
151    * @param value
152    *    The new value for this property.
153    * @return This object
154    */
155   public Response setContent(Map<String, MediaType> value) {
156      content = copyOf(value);
157      return this;
158   }
159
160   /**
161    * Adds one or more values to the <property>variables</property> property.
162    *
163    * @param key The mapping key.
164    * @param value
165    *    The values to add to this property.
166    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
167    * @return This object
168    */
169   public Response addContent(String key, MediaType value) {
170      content = mapBuilder(content).sparse().add(key, value).build();
171      return this;
172   }
173
174   /**
175    * Bean property getter:  <property>link</property>.
176    *
177    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
178    */
179   public Map<String, Link> getLinks() {
180      return links;
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Bean property setter:  <property>Link</property>.
185    *
186    * @param value
187    *    The new value for this property.
188    * @return This object
189    */
190   public Response setLinks(Map<String, Link> value) {
191      links = copyOf(value);
192      return this;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Adds one or more values to the <property>variables</property> property.
197    *
198    * @param key The mapping key.
199    * @param value
200    *    The values to add to this property.
201    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
202    * @return This object
203    */
204   public Response addLink(String key, Link value) {
205      links = mapBuilder(links).sparse().add(key, value).build();
206      return this;
207   }
208
209   // <FluentSetters>
210
211   // </FluentSetters>
212
213   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
214   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
215      if (property == null)
216         return null;
217      return switch (property) {
218         case "description" -> toType(getDescription(), type);
219         case "content" -> toType(getContent(), type);
220         case "headers" -> toType(getHeaders(), type);
221         case "links" -> toType(getLinks(), type);
222         default -> super.get(property, type);
223      };
224   }
225
226   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
227   public Response set(String property, Object value) {
228      if (property == null)
229         return this;
230      return switch (property) {
231         case "description" -> setDescription(Utils.s(value));
232         case "headers" -> setHeaders(mapBuilder(String.class,HeaderInfo.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
233         case "content" -> setContent(mapBuilder(String.class,MediaType.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
234         case "links" -> setLinks(mapBuilder(String.class,Link.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
235         default -> {
236            super.set(property, value);
237            yield this;
238         }
239      };
240   }
241
242   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
243   public Set<String> keySet() {
244      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
245         .addIf(description != null, "description")
246         .addIf(headers != null, "headers")
247         .addIf(content != null, "content")
248         .addIf(links != null, "links")
249         .build();
250      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
251   }
252}
